sections.heading: officers; official oaths; no fees for administering
sections.text: No town officer shall be entitled to any fee or compensation from any individual elected or chosen to a town office for administering to him the oath of office.SourceLaws 1895, c. 28, ยง 61, p. 148;R.S.1913, ยง 1045;C.S.1922, ยง 947;C.S.1929, ยง 26-261
